pages.md:
# Remote Movie Recording Using a Web Browser

5. **Select CREATE NEW** to create a new connection setting profile.

   > 💡 You can also select or edit existing profiles.

   !Create New Connection Setting

6. **Adjust wireless LAN settings.**
   - **ACCESS POINT SETTING:** See “Simple Access Point Connections” (page 264).
   - **IP ADDRESS SETTING:** See “Connecting Using an IP Address” (page 265).

   > 💡 We recommend using (connecting via) a high-speed access point (for example, one that operates in the 5 GHz band).

   !Wireless LAN Settings

7. **After adjusting wireless LAN settings, select NEXT.**

   !Select Next

8. **Name the communication setting profile.**

   !Name Communication Setting
